div.p: Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xijo die Septembris anno et cetera lxxxiijo

The quhilk dai Robert of buchan convict be ane assise was adiugit in amerciament for the wrang
wis' halding of a bonat fra Johne of Knollis sic as he vsis toweyr / and tocontent him within terme of law

The samyn dai the assise forsaid chosin and sworn betuix Johne colisone burges of abirdene
on that a part / and William moyn induellar' of the camfer' on the tothir part / anent al clames and debatis
of al and sindry merchandice somes' of money and gudis quhatsumevir' betuix the said parties And
betuix Dauid colison fadir to the said Johne quhom god assolye and the said Wilyam / And specialy
betuix the said Johne and Wilyam fra the first day of thare intromettingis to this present day
the richtis resonis and allegacionis baith in worde and write of baith the said parties herd
sene producit and vndirstandin / has fundin decretit and deliuerit / that the said William moyn Is
awand and sal pay to the said Johne colisone ane hundreth and nyne pundis sextene s'
and sex pennyis of the vsuale money of Scotland for costis and expensis maid and sustenit
be the said Johne in the name and behalf of the said William / anent certane coppir that
thai had betuix thaim that is tosay the said Wilyam the twa part / and Johne colison the thrid
part / Of the quhilk soume / the said Johne has allowit and strukin of / the the said Wilyame
ane hundreth pundis the quhilkis restit vnpayt to the said William be Johne of levintoune
byar' of the said coppir And sua the said Wilyam restis awand of cleyr to the said John' coli
sone nyne pundis xvj s' and vj d' of the monee forsaid tobe payt to the said Johne within
terme of law / And attour' the said William moyn has quietclamyt and dischargit / and
be this present act / quiet'clamis and dischargis the said Johne colison and his fadir thare ayris
executouris and assignais of al somes' of money merchandice and gudis quhatsumevyr
fra the first day of thare intromettingis to this present day for him his ayris executouris
and assignais now and for evyr as in Instrumentis tane tharuppon vndir the common Seil of caus'
of the said burgh of abirdene mare at lynthe is contenit witnes heirof thomas fife
alexander chamer James cvmyn Johne the vaus ballies Johne of Knollis Johne of culan
Wilyam blindsel William moyses burgez of the said burgh ser Alexander voket / ser Robert
leis and ser Johne striuelin public notaris with vthiris diuers'

The xix day of Septembre yer' forsaid In the tolbuthe before the ballies of abirdene in Jugement
Dauid menyes eldar maistir of the kirkwark of the said burgh declarit / that he had ressauit
fra Anne gray the spous' of Allan smyth / half a chaldir of lyme to the kirkwark for
hir sepulcur' at Sanct eloyis altar in the parroche kirk of Sanct nicolace / quhat tym it sal
happin hir to deces' / tobe allowit til hir be quhatsumevir maistir of the kirkwark
being for the tym in the name of the toune in hail payment and contentacion for the caus' forsaid
Of the quhilk the said maistir of the kirkwark grantit him fullely content and payt And
dischargit the said Anny and al vthiris on hir behalf tharof now and for evyr

xxo die mensis supradicto thomas narne in amerciamento curie pro iniusta inuencione plegij / quod andreas louson tenetur
admitti ad testificandum assise in actione inter eum et Johannem lammynton / cum curia decrevit opposicionem

Johannes lammynton et andreas lammynton amerciatur pro perturbio thome narne in iniusta detencione ipsius thome a
li rowme in carnificio sibi per sortem contingens ut compertum fuit per assisam

Idem thomas amerciatur pro perturbio dictorum Johannis et andree / Et dictus andreas pro perturbio alexandri prat / Et thomas
chamer deuenit plegius legalis pro Johannem lammynton de indempnitate thome narne aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia legalis ballivorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die Septembris anno
Dominj et cetera lxxxiijo /

quo die thomas de Kintor in amerciamento per confessionem propriam pro iniusta percussione Isa
belle vxoris Willelmi cardno Et eadem Isabella conuicta per assisam amerciatur pro perturbio dicti thome

Thomas talyour conuictus fuit quia iniuste percussit et perturbavit cristinam mernoch / quare adiudicatur in amerciamento
et tenetur emendare eedem ad visum proborum virorum

The second dai of octobre yer' forsaid In the tolbuthe of abirdene before Thomas of fife ane of the
ballies comperit Androw lammynton producit for witnes in the caus' within writin quhilk declarit be
the gret aith that he was present and saw quhen ser Robert striuelin chaplan wranguisly distrublit
megy gardnar and tuke hir mantil fra hir and had it with him scho passand hir erandis in the
ton' / Wil hardy and marion huntar second and thrid witnes deponit be the gret aith that the said
ser robert com in the kingis gate besyde ser thomas hervyis yard and distrublit the
said megy gardnar and tuke hir mantil as said is et cetera

Thir ar' the names of the burghis beyond forth that eftir folowis / and the taxt of the samen
modifiit be the commissaris of burghis the tyme of the parliament haldin at Edinburgh
the xxj dai of merche with continacion of dais the yer' of god jM iiijc lxxxiiij
In primis
Coupar vj li' xiij s' iiij d'
Carrale ij li'
Sanctandrois x li'
perth xxij li' iiij s' vj d'
Ouchtirardour' xx s'
Dundee xxvj li' xiij s' iiij d'
forfare xxvj s' viij d'
Montros v li' vj s' viij d'
Breching iiij li'
Bervy x s'
Arbroth' xl s'
Abirdene xxvj li' xiij s' iiij d'
Banf iij li'
Elgyn iiij li'
foras vj li'
Narne xl s'
Enuirnes' x li'

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene proxima post festum beati michaelis archangeli tenta in pretorio
per balliuos eiusdem sexto die mensis octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo tercio
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Johannes de Ruthirfurd de migvy miles electus fuit ad officium prepositure Et Thomas
de fife Willelmus blindsel andreas cullane et Dauid marr' electi fuerunt in officium ballivorum
Ac philippus de Dunbrek alexander de camera Moricius besat et Duncanus straloch'
electi fuerunt in seriendos pro Anno sequente et ad deseruiendum fideliter in dictis officijs Juramenta
prestiterunt corporalia

Inquisicio Thomas prat alexander scrogis Johannes de Kintor adam andirson alexander angussone
Jacobus Kennarty patricius adamson Dauid spens alanus smyth Walterus quhitbrow et
cristinus prat Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam magister gilbertus lovson frater Dauid lowsone latoris
presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de duabus
terris sive tenementis cum pertinenciis iacentibus infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex parte orientali eiusdem
vici videlicet de vna terra inter terram domini Walteri yung capellani ex parte australi et terram Ricardi
young ex boriali parte Et de altera terra iacente inter terram hered' quondam Johannis mathoson ex parte
boriali ex vna et terram Willelmi de garuiach ex parte australi partibus ab altera Et quod dictus Dauid
est legitimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam magistri gilberti fratris suj de dictis terris sive tenementis cum pertinenciis
et est legitime etatis Et quod dicte terre cum pertinenciis valent nunc per annum quadraginta solidos monete
Scocie et tantum valuerunt tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de domino nostro rege per seruicium burga
le et quod nunc existunt in manibus eiusdem domini nostri Regis legitime per seipsum ob mortem dicti
quondam magistri gilberti et a tempore obitus eiusdem per spacium vnius mensis aut eocirca in defectu
veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

Item eodem die dictus Johannes de camera capellanus ac procurator Alexandri Irvin de Drum accedens
ad barram protestabatur nomine procuratorio quo supra pro vno annuo redditu duarum marcarum eidem domino
de Drum hereditarie debit' de quadam terra vasta iacente apud li scule hil ut patet in rotulamentis prece
dentibus ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia
tanquam quarto et peremptorio die huius processus / testibus Johanne scot Johanne barbour alexandro hil et moricio
besat seriando / quj quidem procurator peciit a ballivis Judicium dari facere super recuperacione possessionis et proprietatis
dicte terre in defectu solucionis annuj redditus antedicti a longo tempore non solut' / et quod debuit habere
huiusmodi Judicium porrexit plegium in manu dicti seriendi / et propter debilitatem curie Respectuat' fuit
Judicium desuper dand' per ballivos ad proximam curiam legalem et precipitatur parti quod tunc produ
cat cartam seu euidenciam super clameo annuj redditus antedicti

Item eodem die Johannes de Kintor filius et heres quondam gilberti de Kintor protestabatur pro
vno annuo redditu xiiijcim solidorum eidem debit' de quadam terra vasta in vico furcarum ut
patet in rotulamento primj diei / Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die processus Testibus Jacobo andirson thoma chepman
burgensibus et Duncano straloch seriando

Item eodem die Johannes de marr' filius et heres quondam Johannis de marr' burgensis de abirdene
protestabatur pro annuo redditu x solidorum de vna terra vasta in vico furcarum Jacente ut
patet in rotulamento precedenti ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
presentauit in curia coram ballivis tanquam tercio die huius processus testibus Jacobo andirson thoma chepman
et Duncano straloch vno seriendorum burgi

Eodem die philippus de Dunbrek procurator Willelmi leith de bernis litteratorie constitutus accedens
ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu xviijcim denariorum eidem domino de bernis
annuatim et hereditarie debit' de quadam vasta terra iacente in vico viridi inter terram Ricardi
litstar ex orientali parte et torrentem molendinj ex parte occidentali et domum molendini ex australi
parte et viam regiam ex boreali parte Ad quam terram veniens nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu
recuperando preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia coram ballivis pro primo die huius processus
Testibus henrico mortymar henrico lorne et alexandro chavmer seriando

Item eodem die Willelmus andirson filius et heres quondam Jacobi andirson burgensis huius burgi protestabatur
pro annuo redditu quatuor solidorum et octo denariorum de quadam terra Jacente in vico
viridi inter terram heredum quondam Johannis patirson ex parte boriali / et terram fratrum carmelitarum
ex orientali hereditarie et a longo tempore non solut' Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distrin
gibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia coram ballivis tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Johanne scot alexandro hil burgensibus et Duncano stralogh sergeando

Eodem die prepositus consules et communitas concesserunt in fauorem alexandri alanson' ad recipiendum vnam habi
lem personam quam ipse duxerit presentandum in burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi ita quod ipse
habebit in supplementum ipsius comodum et summam prouenire poterunt pro libertate dicti burgi
Instan' super hoc Roberto blindsel alias preposito et diuersis alijs

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eisdem per Johannem Ruthirfurd de
migvy militis prepositum de abirdene decimo die octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxxiijo

Quo die
subscripti electi fuerunt ad fidele consilium prestandum preposito et ballivis in singulis gubernacionem
iusticie et communis vtilitatis burgi concernentibus
Commune consilium
Alexander chavmer de murchil
alexander menyes
- Robertus blindsel
- Johannes de Knollis
- Johannes colisoune
Johannes de culane
- Dauid symson
alexander rede
Johannes Wormot
- gilbertus Waus
- Johannes stevinson
- andreas murray senior
- Alexander de camera filius
- Dauid menyes senior
- Jacobus cvmyn
- Dauid menyeis iunior
- Thomas prat
- Johannes Waus iunior
Willelmus de Kintor
andreas branche
- Willelmus more
- Johannes stewart
Willelmus moyses
- alexander nachty
- adam andirson
Johannes glenmaluin

Eodem die electi et Jurati ad commune consilium huius burgi et alij diuersi mercatores et fratres gilde
confirmauerunt et decreuerunt illas ordinaciones et statuta que anno preterito fact' fuerunt pro
anno iam futur' durature et cetera

Appreciatores carnium Ranaldus talyour Jacobus de Kintor Ricardus hil andreas Wenton murthacus
glenmaluin Symon de gardin Willelmus malisson Johannes malisson alexander' angusson alexander rol
land theodorius Jacobus Kennarty Thomas de culan Thomas gardnar Nicholaius baxtar Robertus
bughan robertus de vchterles

Gustatores ceruisie electi et Jurati In li crukit quartar de quo alexander chamer est sergeandus
Alanus smyth et georgius Dys' Item in li evin quartar philippi de Dunbrek seriandi Nicholaius
liel et Willelmus sprvnt / Et pro li greyn quartar Duncanj stralogh seriandi Willelmus cvmyn
scissor et Robertus sleich Et pro quarterio de futy moricij besat seriandi Willelmus modan et alexander
logy

The samyn it is statute and ordanit be the aldirman ballies and consale that the baxtaris sal mak the
penny laif contenand xvj vncis of gude and weilbakyn brede and the twa penny laif of
xxxij vncis thareftir / and that na baxtar brek the said paas' vndir the pane statute tharuppon
of before

Item the said day the aldirman ballies and consale has ordanit and deliuerit with consent of Thomas prat and
James of Kintor anent the some' of xj li' optenit be Thomas prat apon the said James
that James of Kintor sal bring ane decrete of the lordis of our Souerane lordis consale / that al
merchandice made and boght in the tyme of the passage and curs' of the blak money suld
be payt eftir as the gold and siluer had passage and yede in that tyme before the downe
crying of the blak money / and that the said James sal produce the said decrete and certifica
cion before the aldirman and ballies of this burgh betuix this and mertymes next tocum And
falyeand of the production of the said certificacion at the terme as said is / that the said James
of Kintor sal content and pay Thomas prat of the said some' of xj li' of the vsuale monee
of scotland that gangis now within terme of law

The xvij dai of october yer' forsaid James of Kintoris wif has deliuerit til Thomas prat
nyne franche crovnis and twa inglis grotis of ane obligacion quhilk the said thomas has
of the said James et cetera

Burgenses et fratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Dominj Johannis ruthirfurde de
migvy militis Anno Dominj millesimo CCCCmo octuagesimo tercio

Andreas symson' filius Dauid symson Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
ut filius burgensis et fratris gilde huius burgi pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

Johannes de tulibo quj disponsauit filiam Johannis glenmalvin gracia prepositi et communis
consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde pro xl s' prestito solito Juramento

Alexander Wilson cordonarius ad requestam domine de forbes factus fuit liber burgensis et frater
gilde huius burgi quj quidem alexander debitum et solitum prestitit Juramentum

Thomas bruke receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad requestam dominj comitis de
Erol prestito solito Juramento

Andreas Watson receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum ad requestam dominj comitis de erol
constabularij Scocie et prestitit Juramentum consuet'

Johannes portar' iunior de consensu quorundam consilij ad instanciam prepositi factus fuit liber'
burgensem et frater gilde prestito solito Juramento

Johannes thomson gracia prepositi et consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde ad requestam magistri Johannis hay prebendarij de crowdan prestito Juramento solito

Jacobus de strathachin de consensu prepositi et consilij factus fuit liber burgensis et frater
gilde ad instanciam Johannis vaus et ob fauorem eiusdem Jacobi pro bene meritis suis prestito Juramento

Andreas Kelaw receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad requestam
dominj comitis de erol prestito solito Juramento

Andreas murison factus fuit liber burgensis et frater gilde pro duabus marcis
quj solitum prestitit Juramentum

Willelmus vmfrason' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde racione
successionis paterne prestito Juramento et cetera

Willelmus Aberdour' receptus fuit per totum consilium et per assensum omnium
comburgensium quasi pro tempore presencium In liberum burgensem huius
ville pro v s' datis preposito tantummodo prestito solito Juramento

Vniuersis et singulis ad quorum noticias presentes littere peruenerint prepositus ballivi consules et mercatores burgi de
abirdene Regnj scocie salutem / in omnium salutare Nouerit vestra vniuersitas Ex eo quod excellentissimus et sere
nissimus dominus noster Rex Scocie metuendissimus suum dilectum familiarem armigerum Georgeum parkle
de eodem eiusdemque prouidencia et circumspectione quam plurimum post considerat' In conseruatorem privilegiorum
nacionis sue incliti predicti regnj suj fecit constituit et ordinavit infra partes et dominia excel
lentis et magnifici principis domini ducis Burgundie pro sua regia voluntate durature velut
sua regia donacio sub suo magno Sigillo dicto georgeo desuper consessa plenius proportat
et testatur Ideo sciatis nos vnanimum nostrum consensum et assensum ad specialem requestam exor
tacionem et mandatum dicti Supremi domini nostri Regis predicto georgeo conseruatori dedisse et
prebuisse dareque et prebere Sperantes eundem conseruatorem fidedignum laudabilem et gene
rosum nobis aliisque mercatoribus nacionis predicte / regnj scocie in exercione suj predicti officij
conseruatoris fore et esse consultum vt valeat ipse igitur quantum ad nos spectat tanquam indu
bitatus conseruator / libertates et priuilegia predicte nacionj scocie per illustrissimos et
magnificos principies burgundie duces concessa sustinere eisdemque vti ac iuxta te
norem et feriem eorundem priuilegiorum in Judicio et extra tenere obseruare et defendere
Ac secundum tenorem vim formam et effectum dicte donacionis Supremj dominj nostri Regis in omnibus
exercere et perpetrare Cuj eciam consentimus et applicamus tenore presencium nostra pro
voluntate durature Necnon ad quecumque acta et statuta condita seu condenda per
burgorum regnj scocie comissarios tociens quociens eiis libuerit et expediens videbatur
pro vtilitate et communi bono mercanciarum regnj predicti promulgand' exequend' et secundum tenores
eorum ut interest exequj faciend' Quare vniuersis et singulis nostris conuicinis et
comburgensibus quibus refert attente supplican' requirimus et rogatus quantum in nobis est in domino
precipimus et mandamus quatenus dicto georgeo conseruatori nostro suisque procuratoribus sibi
in genere potencia et probitate similibus pluribus aut vnj in omnibus et singulis dictum officium
conseruatoris concernen' et concernere valen' prompte respondeatis pareatis et intendatis Sibi aut suis procuratoribus prenotatis stipendia solita et consuet' suis predicessoribus donata hillariter largitudo In
quorum omnium et singulorum fidem et testimonium premissorum Sigillum nostrum commune dicti burgi presen
tibus est appensum apud abirdene quinto die mensis Julij anno Domini Mo iiijcmo lxxxiiijto

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per balliuos eiusdem xiijo die mensis octobris Anno
Dominj millesimo CCCCmo lxxxiijo /

quo die prepositus manucepit probare hodie ad octo dies quod Johannes
de hil intromisit cum quodam equo pertinen' cuidam hominum ipsius de quo equo nondum noticiam
habere nequit ut asseruit et cetera

The samyn dai the action betuix Wilyam cryne and William gelisson' maister vndir god of a
crayer' of the feyr' anent the clame of the said Wilyam crinys hyre was put til
ane sworn assise the parties beand oblist tovndirly thare deliuerence The quhilk
assise fand and deliuerit that the said William gelisson suld pay and content til Wil crine
of his hyre xxv s' j hambre barrel of appillis and a smal barel of vnyonis

Alexander sanchar sworn has deponit and declarit in presence of Thomas fife ane of the balyeis that the condicion
made be him with mawnis Wormot anens Wilyam blindsel for xvj s' g' that the said William was awand
him was this / that Wilyam blindsel was oblist be the faith of his body to pay the said mawnis at
Witsonday next thareftir xlv s' of siluer of vsuale money of Scotland

The xiiij day of october' yer' forsaid It is ordanit be the aldirman and consale / for the offence that
alexander chavmer and philp of Dunbrek seriandis has made til coppyn vmmar' skippar of a barge
of the camfeir' in the asking of thare dewities of the smal custumis / that gif in tym tocum it be
fundin thai or ony of thaim make ony sic offens or strublans til the said skippar or til ony vthir
fremmyt man or alinar' in the taking of thare fee and dewities of the mettage bot gif that
thai fynd thaim iniuryt or wrangit anent the payment of thare said dewities that thai cum
first til the aldirman and counsale and meyn thaim tharupon and thai sal caus' thame til
haf redres' tharof / swa that thai seriandis mak na caus' of displesance til the said alienaris
in thare defaute thai beand convict of ony sic transgression' or offens as said is / that salbe
depriuit of that office of mettage and of al vthir officis that thai haf of the toune for yer' and day

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of the burgh of abirdene be William blindsel and androw culan'
twa of the ballies of the samyn the xv day of october' yer' before writin / It was decre
tit and ordanit be ane sworn assise James cvmyn forspekar' of the samen / that michael ge
lisson skippar of a kervel of the camfere salcum and his barnys and acquite thaim that thai
scathit nocht Richard chavmer of xlvij barrellis of vnyonis and viij barrelis of beer' this beand
done thai fynd that the said richert the merchand suld pay the skippar his fracht that
is tosay gif the skippar bringis the clerk of the barge and deponis with his awn'
barnis that the said richard promittit til him siclike fraght as he clamys that is
viij g' for euery barrel of vnyonis and beer' thai fynd the said richard dettour topay him
samekil / and falyeand that the skippar previs nocht as said is the merchand sal pay bot
vj g' for ilke barrel of vnyonis and viij g' for euery barrel of beer' for fracht in sa fer as
is vnpayt / And on the morn the saidis skippar and merchand com before the said Wilyam blindsel
ane of the balyeis and summittit thartil the gude men than beand in the tolbuthe anent the payment
of certane flemis siluer that is tosay for xlij barrelis of vnyons that the said merchand ressauit furth
of the said schip xxj s' g' and for vij barrelis of beer' iiij s' viij g' And the law ordanit that the skippar
suld ressaue fra the merchand for his li' g' v crovnis scottis And twiching the ij g' clamit
be the skippar mare of the merchand of euery barrel of vnyons that Is referrit to the declaracion of
yan brok and of the witnes beand present the tym of the condicion made betuix the said yan brok and the
merchand

The samyn xv dai of october' yer' et cetera lxxxiij In the tolbuthe of the burgh of abirdene before the aldirman and
balyeis of the samyn in Jugement comperit Wilyam more burges of the said burgh and grantit him awand
til a honorable man Thomas Jakson' citener of Saintandrois sex hamburgh barellis of salt salmond
quhilkis he oblis' him topay to the said thomas or his factouris in this maner vndirwritin that is tosay
twa barellis of Salmond in the craer' of the camfeir' of the quhilk Wilyam gelisson is maistir and
governour vndir god now in hir nixt rais' quhilkis ij barrelis he has assignit incontinent til alexander angus
son factour to the said thomas at his command' and desire And vthir twa barellis tobe deliuerit til
thomas prat factour in that part til thomas Jakson' now in abirdene that thai may be layd in the
barge / of the camfeir callit cristoferus and the maistir coppin vmmar' michael gelisson And ij barellis of salmond
at mydsummir next eftir foloing the date of this act tobe deliuerit to Thomas prat factour to
the said thomas iakson' with power togif quittance of his ressate And gif the said William
more falyeis in the payment of the twa barrelis of Salmond now tobe laid in the said schip cal
lit the barge christoferus he oblis' him topay to the said thomas alsmekil of vsual money be fasternsevin
next her'eftir as fisch gevis in flandris for the said ij barrelis / And gif he falyeis in payment
of the last twa barellis at mydsummir than he oblis' him topay to the said thomas alsmekil
for ilke barel as fisch gevis in flandris at martymes next thareftir before thir witnes James
cvmyn androw menyes ser Walter yong and ser Jhon' striuelin notar with vthir diuers'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvijo die octobris anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die ballivi assignauerunt
Roberto crag ad intrandum Willelmum richartson pro quo deuenit plegius ut asseretur infra huic et vi
giliam Sancti martinj ad calumpniam Thome hatmakar' pro iiijor marcas monete de Danskin Sinautem Idem
robertus respondebit pro dicta summa in termino prefixo
Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxmo die octobris anno quo supra

quo die murthacus glenmaluin extendit plegium quod Andreas murra senior iniuste ab eo tenet x
marcas de termino elapso quj quidem andreas pecijt diem legalem ad respondendum / et ballivi assignauerunt eidem
hodie ad quindenam

The samyn dai Alexander chamer of murchil sworn . has deponit and declarit before Wilyam blindsel ane
of the ballies that he saw Johne of hillis son callit John' / ryde apon a blak hors clamyt be the
aldirman / and brocht that hors til the said alexandris yet and gat na entires thare and yeid away
agane with him

Duncan straloch second witnes deponis be his aith that Johne of hil sayd til him / that he fand
the said hors clamit be the aldirman in his scath / and that he gert tak that hors and send him til
alexander of chameris yet

The ballies has chargit John' of hil tocontent the aldirman of the said hors clamit be him or of the
price of that hors within terme of law / eftir the deposicion of the witnez led tharupon

The assise has ordand that Wat thomson sal pay and content til Dauid menyes eldar maistir of the
kirkwark in the name of Saint nicolace xj s' g' and viij g' in scottis money penny for penny ane
inglis grot for ane vthir

the ballies be the decret of the court has assignit til Richart of culan this dai xv daies
topreve with John' low that he layd a sek on his behalf into the gret kervel apon his
ladyng / and falyeand tharof to pay til Walter achneve xviij s' g' for j sek fraght

fyndelaius fores primo die vocatus ad sectam Johannis lambynton' super eo quod iniuste defert solucionem
xvj s' g' et vj g' eidem Johanni per decretum adiudicat' et optent' aduersus dictum fyndelaium / non comparuit
Ideo precipitur seriando quod capto districto fyndelaio ipsum fuerat ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam 2m diem processus

Eodem die Johannes moore super quem Alexander trail extendit plegium de iniusta detencione solucionis
vij dacrarum correorum ad bonum compotum primo die vocatus ad respondendum non comparuit / quare precipitur Duncano straloch seriando
capere districtum a dicto persone et cetera et premunire eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

Decretum fuit per curiam quod quantum Dauid spens possit probare hodie ad octo dies solut' fore de
decreto arbitrorum inter eum et Duncanum leis tantum allocabitur sibi Et quantum non possit solut' pro
bare tantum satisfaciet dicto Duncano secundum tenorem et formam eiusdem decreti
Ricardus culan fatetur satisfacere Dauid prat de sale per ipsum clamato secundum quod alij mercatores fecerunt

Eodem die / quia in vltima curia capitalis propter debilitatem curie positum fuit in dilacione Judicium
recuperacionis cuiusdam terre apud li scule hil prosecut' per dominum Johannem de camera capellanum ac
procuratorem nobilis viri Alexandri Irvin de Drum vicecomitis deputati de Abirdene vsque ad hanc curiam
Comparens ideo idem procurator peciit in ista curia dictum Judicium dari Vnde per
lectis iiijor processibus ductis per dictum dominum Johannem de camera procuratorem prefati Alexandri
Irvin de Drum super Recuperacione possessionis et proprietatis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis
infra burgum de abirdene apud li Scule hil inter terram Sancti Johannis Jerosolomitum ex parte
orientali et terram quondam domini Johannis de Kynloch nunc sancti ninianj ex parte occidentali
ob defectum solucionis cuiusdam annuj Redditus duarum marcarum eidem domino de
Drum annuatim et hereditarie debit' de eadem terra et a longis temporibus non solut'
Curia mature auisata et hora diei legittime expectata ceterisque peractis que ordo
Juris exigit et requirit decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os Willelmi
modan Judicatoris curie / quod dictus dominus Johannes de camera procurator ac procuratorio
nomine prefati Alexandri Irvin de Drum possessionem et proprietatem dicte terre cum pertinenciis
legittime recuperauit propter defectum solucionis annuj Redditus prenotati / teste curia

The xxj dai of october' yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij The Aldirman consale and communite with ane assent
and consent has ordanit decretit and deliuerit / that Robert blindsel be relevit freit
content and payt of thre score of pundis of vsuale money of Scotland and fiftene bar
rellis of Salmond for the expensis and costis made be him anent the redeming and
owyrgetting of the custum of Salmond of Abirdene perpetualy made at oure
Souerane lordis handis / ffor the payment of the quhilk some of siluer and Salmond
tobe made and payt thire personis vndirwritin ar chosin and sworn with consent of the
hail consel and communite that is tosay . The Aldirman / alexander of chavmer alexander menyes
John' of Knollis Johne of culan John' colison alexander rede Thomas fife Da
uid menyes and thomas prat / giffand thame ful power' tosee and vndirstand quhar'
the said some' may be gottin tane or rasyt outhir' of wattir or land pertening
to the said burgh and falyeand tharof tomak ane general tax throuch oute
the toune and toconclude tharupon' for payment tobe made to the said Robert
of the said some' in al gudly haist and tocomper' this day twa eftir none
or tharby for the conclusion' of the said matir et cetera

The samyn dai the aldirman and consel has decretit and deliuerit that John' the Waus youngar
ane of the ballies this yer' bypast / sal pas with Duncan of Dunbrek to the lande of
alexander alansonis' in the nethirkirkgate / quhilk was resingnit in his handis and de
mayn it as law wil for payment tobe made to the said Duncan eftir the tenor of the
act precedand made tharupon'

Item the aldirman and consel forsaid has ordanit and decretit that Thomas of fife ane of the
ballies of abirdene sal pas with James andirson til a croft liand at the hede of the
gallougate quhilk is thomas scrogis that was resignit in his handis be the said
thomas for the payment of a certane some contenit in ane act gangand before and gif him
state and possession' tharof quhil he be content and payt of the said some Sauffaund
ilke manis richtis

The xxij dai of october' yer' et cetera lxxxiij comperit in the tolbuth before the aldirman and ballies in
Jugement Duncan of forbes the son of Jhon' owyr offerand him tovndirly the law and toansuer'
to the chalance of ony party . that had complenit of him And in sa fer as it was rehersit
that he was of the spulyaris and persewaris ane / that had takin of the nichburis gudis
of the hessilhede pertening to the fredom of this burgh and nane com to folou him tharupon
he has be the gret bodily aith purgit and acquyt him a with him vthir ij men in cumpany
of al sic transgressioun and offens made be him til ony person' or personis outhir of the hessil
hede or of ony vthir place pertening to the fredom of this burgh

The xxiij dai of october yer' forsaid the ballies consel and communite beand present in the tolbuthe has
consentit and ordanit ane commission' tobe selit vndir the common seil for certane commissaris chosin be thaim
that is tosay ser John' of ruthirfurd of migvy knycht aldirman alexander chamer of murchil alexander
menyes Jhon' of knollis Jhon of culan Jhon' colison thomas fife alexander rede Dauid menyes yongar and
thomas prat / fortoset and tomail lat thare fischingis vndirwritin that is tosay to Walter ach
neif his ayris and assignais the fisching of half a net of the mydchingil apon the wattir
of Dee / And til androw murray eldar his ayris and assignais ane sext part of the fisching of the
Crois apon the wattir of Done for the termis of twenty yeris immediatly eftir thare entra to the
samyn quhilk Intre salbe in the vigil of Sanctandrow of the yer' of god M iiijC and nynty yeris
eftir the tenour and fourm of the samyn commission' than red and made tharupon et cetera

Johannes Waus iunior coram Dauid marr' vna ballivorum constituit Johannem colison alexandrum rede Dauid
menyes et alexandrum chamer filium coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores ad prosequendum Johannem stevinson
pro v barellis salmonum thomam quhite et quoscumque alios in omnibus actionibus ipsum concernentibus
promittens de rato et cetera In vberiori forma procuratorij /

The xxiiij dai of october' yer' of god et cetera / lxxxiij In the tolbuthe before the aldirman balliez and
diuers' of the consel comperit Robert blindsel aldirman of the yer' last bypast and oblist him be
his landis and gudis tofreith releve and kepe scaithles this burgh of Abirdene officeris
and communite of the samyn of al fermes and pencionis acht til our Souerane lord / lord
erskyn erle of craufurd and vthiris quhatsumevir of the said yere in the quhilk he
bure office / before thir witnez James lesly Dauid menyes alexander of chamer the son John'
colison alexander rede androw murray eldar Waltir achneve and vthiris sundry

The samyn dai the Aldirman grantit him tilhaf ressauit fra Wat of achneve and
androw murray eldar in the name of the lard of Drum ten pundis of vsuale monee
acht til him be the toune for a stabil gevin be him to the dilating of Sancte
nicholace qveyr' / of the quhilkis x li' pait be the forsaidis Walter and androw on the
behalf and at the ordinance of the toun the forsaid aldirman is oblist todeliuer'
sufficient acquitance to the toune of the said lard of Drum anent the said x li' within
iij dais eftir that he cum til abirdene

The samen dai Robert blindsel grantit him fullely content and pait of the some of thre score
of pundis of vsuale monee of scotland and fiftene barrellis of salmond be the aldirman
and communite of abirdene in ful contentacion and payment of al costis and expensis made apon
the rasing and optenit of a chartir of our Souerane lord the kingis vndir his gret seil gran
tit of the annullacion and perpetual redeming of the custum of salmond pertening til the
said burgh / In the quhilkis somez the toun was bundin til the said robert as mare
fullely in actis made tharupon is content / Of the quhilkis somes of money and Salmond the
said Robert has dischargit and quitclemit the aldirman and communite of the said burgh
now and for evyr in tym tocum before thir witnez James lesly Thomas fife alexander
rede Dauid menyes androw murray eldar Walter achneve ser Jhone striuelin notar and
vthiris diuers'

The samyn dai Androw murray eldar and Wat of achneve borowit x li' fra the aldirman of vsuale
money of scotland quhilk soume thai haf oblist thaim topay and deliuer to the said aldirman
on alhallow evyn next tocum / and falyeand tharof ten li' g' of the money of flandris
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio per ballivos xxv die mensis et annj predictorum

quo die Actio Jacobi lesly
aduersus Dauid Kintor penes certam firmam piscatorum clamatam de anno sue prepositure respectuatur
ad diem lune pro finali determinacione tunc habenda

James lesly in presence of the aldirman and ballies is oblist that quhat tym the aldirman and ballies
makis him tohaf iustice of the persons awand thare wattirmalis and dewiteis restand vnpait
of the yer' that he was in office gif it happinnis that ser Wilyam achlek cheplan and seruitor to lord
erskyn remainnis atour the said tyme / for ilke day that he remainnis in the said James les
lyis defaute topay and content til him j croune for his expensis

The same dai the action of strublance and offens betuix Jhone colison and his party / and Wilyam
more and his party is summittit and referit with consent of bath the parties to the determinacion and
ordinance of / the aldirman James lesly robert blindsel John' of Knollis thomas fife alexander rede
Dauid menyes yongar and James cvmyn sworn to the rychtwis' determinacion tharof eftir thare vndirstanding
and the parties ar oblist and sworn tovndirly and stand to thare decret and ordinance in the said matir
and tocompere to morn at twa eftir none or tharby in the magdalen Ile tharapon tohaf thare
deliuerence et cetera
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xxv3o die octobris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiijo

The samen dai It was fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn assise that Dauid Kintor is quyte
of the wattir mail clamit be James cvmyn of a thrid part of a net of the pot wattir
extendand til xliiij s' vj d'

Item the said dai It was ordanit deliuerit and decretit be the said assise that Jacob symondson'
skippar of the barge callit Jacob of the camfeir sal deliuer oute of his schip ane pipe
of wad til alexander stokkaris wif and his executouris incontinent

Item the said dai the assise has ordanit the actis made betuix Dauid marr' and alexander
trail anent the some of xj merkis acht be the said alexander to Dauid marr' be his obligacion
be obseruit and kepit / and put to deuly execucion eftir the tenour of the samyn

The xxix day of october' yer' forsaid comperit before the aldirman and balliez in Jugement Androu
murray eldar and Walter achneve and rehersit that quhare thai war oblist topay to
the aldirman on the behalf of the lard of Drum at the ordinance of the toune ten pundis
of vsuale money of scotland on alhallow evin nixt tocum / that the said some was
pait be thaim this day til Jhon' colisone at the command' of the aldirman The quhilk
some of ten pundis the said Jhone colison' grauntis him tilhaf tane and ressauit be the
handis of the forsaidis androw and Walter in novmerit money Of the quhilk x li' the aldirman
and John' colison in name of the toune haldis thaim weil content and fullely pait / And has
quitclemit and dischargit the forsaidis androw and Walter tharof now and for evyr

the samyn day alexander sanchar' grantit before the aldirman and ballies that he is awand
to meg alanson xviij s' quhilkis he is ordanit topay within terme of law

Dauid spens has apprevit and ratifijt the decrete made betuix him and Duncan leis
like as Androw murray eldar and Walter achneve twa of the arbitroris than present grantit
thai had deliuerit in fourm of the write vndir the notaris hand and androw murrais seil

The action betuix Dauid marr' and alexander trail is continuit be the ballies for waiknes
of the court quhil mononday nixt tocum with consent of partiez

The samyn day comperit before Thomas of fife and Wilyam blindsel twa of the
ballies in Jugement Wilyam broune the spous' of Annabil trail and for him and his
said spous' has constitute and ordanit Dauid marr' his gude son' in law alexander chamer
yongar and Jhon' of Kintor the son of Dauid Kintor coniunctly and seueraly thare verray lach
ful procuratouris actouris factouris and speciale deputis til persew and recovir fra
Adam andirson a barn with the tail togiddir with the mail . And al vthir malis annu
ellis and dewiteis pertening til him and his said spous' be reson' of hir Junctfeftment
or vthirwais within the burgh of abirdene and the fredome of the samyn totak lift and
rais' And in al vthir actionis concerning thame / promittand tohald ferm and stabil
to stand to Jugement and al thing Jugit topay with ful power' towyn' and tyne
and al vthir claus' of procuratory nedeful or requirit

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per balliuos eiusdem tercio die mensis
nouembris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiijo quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotolo sectarum

Thomas quhite super quem Johannes Waus iunior extendit plegium de iniusta detencione dimidij barelle
salmonum primo die vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio / non comparuit / quare precipitur Duncano straloch
seriando capere districtum et cetera et premunire eundem thomam ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam
secundum diem processus

the ballies has assignit til fyndlaw fores friday the vij day of this instant moneth
topreve xvj s' g' vj g' and ij inglis contenit in a decret togiddir with iiijor li' g' pait
to Jhon' of lambyntonis factouris

the samyn day alexander chavmer seriand was chargit be the ballies tocontent and pay til ser
androw thomson xiij s' iiij d' of vsuale money within xv daies but langar delay acht
til him of termys bigane like as ane act / made tharuppon' of before proportis

The samyn dai Richart of culan diuers' tymes callit at the instance of Walter achneve
eftir the tenour of an act precedand topreve this day with John' low that he layd j
sek on his behalf apon his ladyn into the gret kervel / comperit nocht quharfor
in defaute of the said preif It was decretit be the court that the said Richart
sal content and pay to the said Walter xviij s' g' for a sek fraght within terme
of law

Item the said day the assise has fundin and deliuerit that Dauid marr' is quyte of the
wrangwis' taking and intrometting of certane corn belanging Alexander trail
and of the clame of the samen

Item the assise has deliuerit that Jacob symondson skippar is quyte of the
clame of xj hydis clamit be Wilyam goldsmyth / and of the wranguis'
intrometting of thaim / And that the said Wilyamis merchand Wilyam the hay of
elgyne salbe responsale til him for the said xj hidis becaus' he was merchand
til him

The samyn day the assise has deliuerit and ordanit that Androw murra eldar sal content and pay til
murtho glenmaluin ten merkis of vsuale money of scotland wppon the quhilkis
the said murtho folowit the said Androw murray eldar be a borch and the said Androw is
in amerciament of the court for the wranguis' halding of the said some and tocontent
him within terme of law

In the balye court of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe the v dai of nouember yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij
comperit frer' Richart barrown and grantit him fullely content and payt be the handis of
Alexander chavmer seriand of the Sowme of four' merkis of vsuale money of Scotland for the quhilk
some thom gledstane is bundin til the said alexander of chamer be his obligacione for a land
lyand in the grene bocht be the said thom gledstane fra the said frere Richart with consent
of the priour' and conuent of the quhite freris of abirdene / And has quytclamit and dischar
git the said alexander tharof for evyr

The same dai the ballies and specialy Wilyam blindsel has assignit til Androw murra eldar and Wilyam
futhes with thare awn consent friday next tocum tocomper' at the instance of Androw andirson or his
procuratouris todo law and tak law anent the lotting of certane gudis tane fra the said androw
andirson be holandaris oute of James cantis kervel

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem vijo die nouembris anno
Domini supradicto /

quo die andreas symson conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie quia
iniuste perturbauit Johannem stewart et tenetur emendare parti lese ad visum proborum virorum
Et Idem Johannes accusatus de perturbio dicti andree binis vicibus quitus factus fuit per dictam assisam

The same dai the assise has deliuerit and ordanit that Adam andirson sal content and pay
til Alexander sanchar' fyve pund g' as assigna til Wilyam blindsel eldar for the fisching
of ane auchtand part of the crois of the samyn gudis arrestit be the said alexander
in the feyr pertening to the said adam / and the said alexander salmak the said gudis fre
of al costis except fracht and hous' hyre / to the said adam / And the forsaid alexander
sal warrand as law wil the forsaid fisching of the crois to the said adam indurand
his termes in sa fer as the v li' g' extendis to

It is ordanit and decretit be the court that thom rolland sal answer' to Wilyam moyses
anent ane obligacion of a barel of salmond this day xv dais as day peremptour'
And in siclike wise Wilyam quelp is ordanit til ansuer' til the said thom rolland the
samyn dai for the said barel of salmond and for the frething of him of the samyn

The same dai James lesly becom law borgh for John' stewart that Andro
symson salbe scathles of him vthirwais than the cours' of common law wil
And Alexander rede is becumin in law borch for the said androw symson that Jhon stewart
salbe scaithles of him vthirwais than law wil / And quhilk of the said
parties offendis or persewis vthir in tym tocum and specialy the said androw to persew the said
Jhon' in his hous' the consel has ordanit ony of the said parties makand offens
and convict tharin topay to Sanct nicholace wark ten merkis but remission' et cetera
